properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWnUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT TRM_NO , TRM_CLASS , TRM_TITLE , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_ID , TRM_REMARKS FROM TERMS ORDER BY TRM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT TRM_TITLE , TRM_CLASS , MEM_ID , CONTENT , TRM_REMARKS FROM TERMS WHERE TRM_NO = ?
SELECT CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY2 WHERE CATEGORY_NO != 1 AND CATEGORY_NO != 2
INSERT INTO TERMS ( TRM_NO , TRM_CLASS , TRM_TITLE , CONTENT , TRM_REMARKS , MEM_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_TRM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
